general.gigTitle: design websites in figma and develop it on framer

sellerCard.description: Hello! I'm a UI/UX designer and a Framer Expert with 5 years under my belt, turning complex ideas into user-friendly web and mobile designs that people love. Passionate about crafting beautiful, intuitive experiences, I bring visions to life with a dash of creativity and a user-first approach. Let's make something awesome together!

description.content:
Are you in search of a visually appealing, conversion-optimized website or landing page? You've come to the right place! I specialize in designing modern and optimized websites and landing pages in Figma and converting them into deployable sites using Framer. My approach combines aesthetic appeal with functionality, ensuring your landing page looks great and performs well.


Why Choose Me?

  • Figma and Framer Expertise
  • Responsive and Interactive Designs
  • SEO-Optimized design
  • Quick Turnaround
  • Unlimited revisions until your complete satisfaction.


What You Will Get:

  • A custom-designed landing page in Figma tailored to your brand and goals.
  • Conversion of the Figma design into a deployable website using Framer, ready for online presence.
  • A responsive design that provides a seamless experience on desktops, tablets, and smartphones.
  • SEO-friendly structure to help you rank better on search engines.


How It Works:

  • Initial Consultation
  • Design Creation
  • Feedback & Revisions
  • Framer conversion
  • Delivery support


Feel free to contact me for any queries.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you integrate my brand elements into the design?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, your brand's visual elements will be integral to the design, ensuring consistency and recognition.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What support do you offer post-delivery?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I provide 15days of support after delivery to address any potential issues or questions.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How do I get started with my landing page project?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: To get started, simply place an order and send me your requirements, any content (text and images) you want to include, and any specific ideas or examples you have in mind. The more details you provide, the better I can meet your expectations.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do you need from me to create the best landing page design?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I'll need your brand guidelines (if you have them), logo, color preferences, content (text for each section), any specific images you want to use, and examples of landing pages you like. This information will help me tailor the design to your brand and vision.

packageList.title: Single Page Framer Build
packageList.description: 1 landing page up to 5 sections(Figma to Framer Build) + Fully responsive.

packageList.title: Professional Framer Website build
packageList.description: 5 Pages Framer Websites with CMS pages Setup.

packageList.description: 10 Pages Framer Websites with CMS pages Setup.

openGraph.title: design websites in figma and develop it on framer

reviews.comment: Shahid did an amazing job on our new website! The only reason I put 4-stars was the timeline was not quite as expected, but he delivered an awesome product in the end and was very attentive to detail. He was responsive and communicative throughout the process, as well, which makes a huge difference when working with someone on a platform like Fiverr. All gratitude to Shahid for his work!

Shahid stopped responding after the order completed on fiverr -- even though, the delivery was incomplete. the project is taking substantially long even though there was little to no creative input from his end, and it was just a copy paste project.

Wasted 10+ days for nothing. Before payment he seem very professional. After payment he literally ignored me every day and did not start the project while I saw him online. 

Save your money and time. Look for another freelancer.

Shahid was who we needed while developing out website. We were not very sure if we were completely happy with design and expected changes. Shahid accepted all requests and worked with his head down and delivered everything as asked.

Hasan did an outstanding job on my website, delivering a professional and detail-oriented result. Communication was always fast and easy, and he implemented all my requests perfectly. The final product exceeded my expectations – modern, functional, and tailored exactly to my needs. I highly recommend Hasan and will definitely work with him again in the future! Thank you for the amazing work! 🙌
